span.style: vertical-align: baseline; font-size: 15px; line-height: 17px; white-space: pre-wrap;

font.b: Psychological tendencies and how they impact relationships

span.style: vertical-align: baseline; font-size: 15px; line-height: 17px; white-space: pre-wrap;
vertical-align: baseline; font-size: 15px; line-height: 17px; white-space: pre-wrap;
font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Firstly we must understand that mental disorders are very common in the population. One in 5 people will suffer from at least one diagnosable disorder during their lives. To say nothing of the tendencies that all of us have. They also have an early onset with 75% of cases occurring before the age of 24. (

span.style: font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(17, 85, 204); text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;
font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;
font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: These are not only issues that “people with mental disorders have”. In their more benign state they are tendencies that practically all humans exhibit a subset of.

span.style: font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: So familiarizing oneself with what they are and how they impact relationships especially at their tendency levels is very important.

span.style: font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: They are, but not limited to: narcissism, bipolar disorder, depression, post traumatic stress, addiction, compulsive lying, codependency, low self esteem, obsessive compulsive disorder, sulking/silent treatment, hoarding, passive aggressive, autism, aspergers, sociopath.

span.style: font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;
font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: We all tend to be angry sometimes but if you exaggerate you are an abuser and if you never get angry you may be severely conflict avoidance.

span.style: font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: We all tend to act in our best interest but if you exaggerate you are a narcissist or a sociopath while at the opposite end you may be co dependent or have severe low self esteem.

span.style: font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;
font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;
font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;
font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;
